website_summaries.verdict: Great for standard-sized screwdriver sets, this organizer fits most tool cart drawers well.
pros: Does a great job of holding screwdrivers in one spot inside a tool drawer, thanks to molded dividers
Has a variety of compartment sizes
cons: Not wide enough to hold complete screwdriver sets, in some cases
No slots for larger or longer-handled screwdrivers

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must have for any very organized person.
customer_reviews.text: I might be a little OCD but I feel being organized is a nessecity. As you can see in the picture, the three screwdriver organizers work very well for my 33" wide drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing a tool drawer
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of having to roulette my way through my screwdrivers. bought this organizer and now I can clearly see each one and have them sorted by size, type, etc. I did have to prune back the number of screwdrivers I have in my drawer, but I prefer the clean drawer over a larger quantity of tools I have to sort through. The various sized slots are convenient and allow for having a variety of different sized drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5 Star Item
customer_reviews.text: The only draw back that kept me from giving it a 5 star was that this item raises the screw drivers so as to possibly compromise using in a "shallow" drawer. I have a newer tool rollaway and I barely have the clearance but it dies work. Be careful as older and some newer rollaway boxes may not have the clearance needed. depending on the make and model of screw drivers no all will fit. The longer straight blade screw driver provided in Snap-On screw driver sets is about 1/16 too long for a good fit. For standard and general use screw drivers as in the item photo, this item performs well.
customer_reviews.author: Monster Mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Helps a bit - neater than they were
customer_reviews.text: My screwdrivers were occupying a large drawer and I wanted to organize them a bit. I'm cheap, so slow to buy things that are basiclly plastic sorters. That said, this helped enough with organizing to justify the purchase. Only grief is screwdrivers tend to move a bit when the drawer is puleld hard open or slammed closed. I pan to stray the tray with some rubber spray to give it a bit of grip. Overall, worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. My large screw drivers fit but they sit crooked on the other ends. Kinda wish these were bigger and had more room for more screw drivers. But overall they fit in the drawers great and keep everything in place. Saves a lot of room. Magnetic bases or sticky pads on the bottom would be great... I added my own though
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Tool Chest Organizer.
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a large tool chest to better organize my garage, and found some YouTube videos on tool chest organization. I tried a number of the products I learned about with varying success; and this item is one of the ones I'm still using. The varied shapes can be a little problematic for storing what one has - but I'm using one of them for some of my smaller screwdrivers and other odd-shaped tools.
customer_reviews.author: james_98188

customer_reviews.title: NOT A GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Product is much smaller than expected, very shallow and does not fit all size tools, especially larger wrenches, screwdrivers and sockets. The material appears to be durable but way over-priced. I have already replaced the 4 units I bought with 2 tool caddies and a toolbox that were half the cost and much more functional.
customer_reviews.author: ron davis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great organizer tray. It's the perfect size. My drawer is a standard width but it's very short. So this works perfectly because the small height does not reach the height of the drawer. It's also very well made and can hold a lot of tools. Personally, I use it for more than just screwdrivers. Any tool that's narrow will work well, whether long or short. It keeps things from moving all over when you open and close the drawers. Must have for a tool or organizational drawer. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, I wish it would come in different sizes. I have more screwdrivers than slots that this provides, but it still keeps all of my tools in one place. I opted to only use one so that I could use the drawer space for other things. If I upgrade to a wider tool chest, I'll get another one of these to use side-by-side. This accommodates​ my Craftsman screwdrivers with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great organizer tray. It's the perfect size. My drawer is a standard width but it's very short. So this works perfectly because the small height does not reach the height of the drawer. It's also very well made and can hold a lot of tools. Personally, I use it for more than just screwdrivers. Any tool that's narrow will work well, whether long or short. It keeps things from moving all over when you open and close the drawers. Must have for a tool or organizational drawer. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: R. Harlow

customer_reviews.title: a must have
customer_reviews.text: I really love this thing. I just organized my entire tool box and this really makes your drawer's look sharp. I bought this and the one for wrenches. This is the link on Amazon for the wrench organizer which is a amazing as well.  I also bought this socket wrench organizer on Amazon:
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: A good organizer with some flexibility!
customer_reviews.text: I suspect you will do as I did and load more things into this organizer than it has slots, and not all will be screwdrivers. It works well, although I do wish there were more slots for larger-handled screwdrivers. I like this device, as opposed to its sister pliers organizer (which see).
customer_reviews.author: Kent Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Concerned About Long Term Use but it Does Oragnize Tools into a Small Spot
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was concerned about the durability of this tray when it arrived and I saw how it was constructed. I kept one of the 3 I ordered and returned the other two. I think the concept is fine. Size is compact which is good in some ways but it can be a little tight. I'm also concerned about the long run durability and convenience of the design and materials.
customer_reviews.author: Dutton and Beth Armstrong, Editors

customer_reviews.title: Screwdriver storage
customer_reviews.text: Not sure value vs cost is the best. It appears to do the job if you already have screwdriver assortment that fits. I didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rippe

customer_reviews.title: Would have been useful if it held tools so that they could be ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have been useful if it held tools so that they could be hung on wall. Takes up too much space in tool box drawer for what it holds.Ok if you have limited amount of screwdrivers. Doesn't accommodate large and very small tools.
customer_reviews.author: Bud L.

customer_reviews.title: Some niche slots but overall excellent organization tray for the misc things
customer_reviews.text: It is well made and fits great in my tool drawer. I expected it to hold more and some slots seem a bit too niche. Overall a great buy that I have no regrets about buying.
customer_reviews.author: Chan1689

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Perfect for screwdrivers. I feel like it takes up a lot of drawer space for holding just a few drivers. Feels flimsy but it really just has to sit in your drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: I went back to a 2 dividers in my drawer so i have 3 compartments and i feel like that is so much easier for me
customer_reviews.text: Its just ok. I went back to a 2 dividers in my drawer so i have 3 compartments and i feel like that is so much easier for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself some tool box drawer space and get this. Fits all my screwdrivers, so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: invertedcheeses

customer_reviews.title: easy organizing
customer_reviews.text: Made in USA and fits my screwdrivers very nicley. I need another to hold more now! It fits the traditional craftsman set so that means the husky and masterforce brands fit as well.
customer_reviews.author: kjl419

customer_reviews.title: Ordering another
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so awesome I will be ordering another. My bosses had me build a service truck out of an old Sprinter. For the tools I just bolted a six foot tall tool chest in the back of the truck at the rear doors. This organizer hold the drivers even in place even with the truck driving around all day making it easy to quickly grab the one I need.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Organizer
customer_reviews.text: The screwdriver organizer works well but I had to make some modifications in order for it to work on my old, square handled Snap-on screwdrivers. I used a Dremel tool to notch out some slots and do some customizing. Once the job was done, they fit really well.
customer_reviews.author: Dino028

customer_reviews.title: You could put two side by side it would be tight
customer_reviews.text: Could have used some more trays for longer screwdrivers otherwise it fits perfect in my box
customer_reviews.author: Earle Harris 3rd

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: These are a easy way to organize if you have a big set of screwdrivers get 2 to make sure you can fit them all 2 fits in standard craftsman tool chest drawer with extra room yet just wish the piece you can hang it by would be made to break off easily all in all nice thing to have
customer_reviews.author: Kerry f.

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be larger
customer_reviews.text: Fine for all your shorter screwdrivers, but it doesn't handle longer ones. If this was a larger size to fit the whole drawer, you'd be able to fit all your screwdrivers in it.
customer_reviews.author: MCR

customer_reviews.title: Hold most sizes
customer_reviews.text: Had to move stuff around and rearrange to fit quite a bit, but once I got my particular set in there, it works perfectly in the toolbox drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Nice organizer for a tool box
customer_reviews.text: Another good product for the handyman who loves to have tools organized and handy. Easy to install and use. Well packaged and easy to open packaging. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: best screwdriver layout I have been looking for for years.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of tools, bought big Matco tool box, and still not enough for home mechanic. This is the best screwdriver layout I have been looking for for years. I have set up many production centers, R&D labs, and would use this in professional setting (probably called a genius). Have not been pro mechanic in 25 years, but could have squeezed more milk money out during college then. Much better than peg board setups.
customer_reviews.author: 0atMMC

customer_reviews.title: Love this holder for my drivers
customer_reviews.text: Love this holder for my drivers. I will be ordering another and keep flats in one and philips in another.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I expect this tray will last forever - a little overpriced but does exactly what it's supposed to do, and i should never need to replace.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps screwdrivers in one place
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have the screwdrivers in one place not rolling around my tool box

customer_reviews.title: I use this tray to organize my core screwdriver set ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this tray to organize my core screwdriver set. It allows me to quickly find the screwdriver I need and see if any screwdrivers are missing. It accommodates both very small and very long tools.
customer_reviews.author: Nick G

customer_reviews.title: Simple and works as described. Doesn't add much height ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple and works as described. Doesn't add much height to the tools, which was important to me since I'm using it in a fairly shallow rolling toolbox drawer.

customer_reviews.title: Don't hold much
customer_reviews.text: If you have a lot of screw drivers don't bother it holds 8, depending grip style some don't fit.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy way to organize screw drivers.
customer_reviews.text: Quick, easy and cheap way to finally organize my screw driver drawer. Cannot go wrong with this tray, check dimensions to make sure it will fit your box.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly small.struggles to hold large set of screwdrivers
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly small.struggles to hold large set of screwdrivers, not laid out as effectively as I hoped. Lacks slots for smaller drivers. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: 😎👍
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece. Probably a little overpriced but i like it.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality. Made for Standard Screw Drivers.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. But it's not quite big enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. But it's not quite big enough for the large screwdrivers that come in almost all sets. But it has helped to save space in my roll cart.

customer_reviews.title: Great tray, seems to work alright- fitting all the ...

customer_reviews.author: Power Tool Marine

product_meta.title: Tool Sorter Screwdriver Organizer Black
product_meta.description: Finally all the various screwdrivers are in one place. This organizer offers plenty of space for long, short, stubby, or off-set screwdrivers. Or just store whatever has a shaft and handle and fits as shown in the picture. The maximum length of tools to be stored is 10.5”. The low profile tray with dimensions of 13” x 10” x 1” can be used in shallow tool drawers and provides space for up to16 screwdrivers and 8 bits. This organizer works with all types and brands of screwdrivers. Getting the typical random assortment or a set of screwdrivers stored is not a problem. Little compartments in the tray accommodate a range of handle sizes. Small troughs in the compartments limit movement of the tools in the tray. Please note that screwdrivers are not held in place by clips. This tray is compact, portable and made of sturdy ABS – you will feel the quality! This tray is a great addition to tool chests of professionals and serious DIY mechanics, and a very useful thing to have in every home. Tools are not included!
feature_bullets: Quality organizer for Screwdrivers - Made in the USA
Storage section for large, small, off-set, stubby screwdrivers and bits
Measures 13" x 10" x 1" - compact and portable
